description: The initiative focuses on advancing research in alternative proteins, aiming to enhance food systems and promote sustainability. Established in Catalonia, it operates as a virtual research center, collaborating with various researchers across the region. The initiative seeks to address challenges in producing alternative proteins for both human consumption and animal feed, emphasizing self-sufficiency and reducing reliance on imported materials. By exploring diverse sources such as plants and insects, the project aims to innovate and develop economically viable solutions while engaging with stakeholders to ensure practical applications of their findings.
name: IRTA CIPA Centro de Innovación en Proteínas Alternativas
